caption.title: Spatial distribution of the risk of AHS persistence among all holdings with plains zebra in the Western Cape Province.
caption.p: Risk of persistence was computed using either the median outbreak duration and the probabilities that AHS outbreaks would persist for >1 year, >2 years and >3 years. Risk measures were computed over 40 independent AHS introductions in all individual holdings. Here AHS was consistently introduced in April 2012.
Click here for additional data file.
